DOC.brief_summary: GSK2618960 humanize Immunoglobulin G 1 ( IgG1 ) monoclonal antibody ( mAb ) bind alpha component ( CD127 ) heterodimeric Interleukin-7 receptor ( IL-7R ) . It develop treatment autoimmune indication . This study intend explore safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , pharmacodynamics ( PD ) immunogenicity single ascending dos GSK2618960 healthy volunteer beyond already evaluate I7R116702 ( First Time In Human study ) . The study anticipate enrol 18 subject total , 9 subject two cohort .
